name: help.timestamps
command:
print(`{p}${IRC.trigger}memo{/} and {p}${IRC.trigger}remind{/} accept various formats for times;`)
print(`absolute times: ${['YYYY-MM-DD','HH:MM', 'HH:MM:SS', '3am', '3pm', 'sunday', 'feb', '3rd', 'march', '2019', 'tomorrow'].map(d => `{y}${d}{/}`).join`, `}`)
print(`relative times: ${['3 weeks', '1y', '4 mins', '10 hours', '7d'].map(d => `{y}${d}{/}`).join`, `}`)
print(`each format can be combined to create a time offset`)
